solution_line_template: Daniel practices for a total of {practice_minutes_school_day} x {school_days_per_week} = <<{practice_minutes_school_day}*{school_days_per_week}={minutes_school_week}>>{minutes_school_week} minutes during the school week.

He practices {practice_minutes_school_day} x {weekend_practice_multiplier} = <<{practice_minutes_school_day}*{weekend_practice_multiplier}={practice_minutes_weekend_day}>>{practice_minutes_weekend_day} minutes each day on the weekend.
So, he practices a total of {practice_minutes_weekend_day} x {weekend_days} = <<{practice_minutes_weekend_day}*{weekend_days}={minutes_weekend}>>{minutes_weekend} minutes on the weekend.

Thus, Daniel practices for a total of {minutes_school_week} + {minutes_weekend} = <<{minutes_school_week}+{minutes_weekend}={total_practice_minutes_week}>>{total_practice_minutes_week} minutes during a whole week.
